short_description: End-to-end place returns ok and correct payload/exit code
Service+repo create persists correct order state
Parser accepts representative valid partitions
Mobile/message validation boundaries
List returns outstanding orders and correct count
Repo groups pending orders by mobile
Show returns order or ORDER_NOT_FOUND
Repo retrieves stored order deterministically
Batch emits per-line JSON and summary
Batch malformed lines produce correct error payload
Wrong auth causes no persisted transition
Fulfill returns UNAUTHORIZED exit code on bad auth
Second fulfill rejected and no state change
CLI returns within bounded time for finite input
Grammar violations rejected with correct codes
Max items/max qty/aggregation overflow boundaries
SQL injection-style inputs do not alter DB/schema
Review evidence: parameterized SQL usage
Simulated DB errors produce DATABASE_ERROR with no partial writes
Measure mean/p95 for place under defined workload
Measure lines/sec and distribution
Stdout JSON is deterministic (stable key ordering)
Design evidence: seams enable isolation/determinism
Metrics output schema and reset semantics
